casebody.data:
SOUTHERN TRANSPORTATION COMPANY, as Owner of Barge THE BARNEGAT and THE Tug BERMUDA, Libelant-Appellee, v. THE Tug RUSSELL NO. 16, her Engines, etc., and Newtown Creek Towing Company, Claimant-Respondent-Appellant. No. 338. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. April 1, 1935. Alexander, Ash & Jones, of New York City (Edward Ash and Lawson R. Jones, both of New (York City, of counsel), for appellant. Bigham, Englar, Jones & Houston, of New York City (A. J. McElhinney, of New York City, of counsel), for appellee.

Before MANTON, SWAN, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed.
